m_szDocTitle: How do I ... reduce my carbon emissions? | UK news | The Guardian
m_szDocSumamry: How do I…? How do I ... reduce my carbon emissions? In order to avoid climate calamity, global temperatures must not rise by more than 2C. Here’s how you can do your bit Switching to a renewable energy supplier is one way you can lessen your impact on the planet. Photograph: Julian Stratenschulte/EPA Friday 27 November 2015 05.00 EST Last modified on Friday 27 November 2015 05.53 EST Share on WhatsApp On Monday, one of the biggest meetings in the world will begin in Paris.
